function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate compliance with safety steps, job-site hygiene, social distancing, and personal protective equipment","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission among workers","Mitigation":"Enforcement of safety measures, regular inspections, and education of workers on best practices","Technologies":"Monitoring and surveillance technology, contact tracing apps","People":"Construction workers, subcontractors","Owner":"City of Boston, construction permittees"},{"Description":"Lack of adherence to CDC, OSHA, and state regulations and guidelines","Impact":"Higher likelihood of non-compliance with pandemic safety standards","Mitigation":"Regular updates on guidelines, training on regulatory requirements, and continuous monitoring of compliance","Technologies":"Online training platforms, regulatory compliance software","People":"Construction permittees, subcontractors","Owner":"City of Boston, state regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Failure to provide adequate site-specific safety plans","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 outbreak due to lack of tailored safety measures","Mitigation":"Development of comprehensive site-specific safety plans, regular review and updating of plans","Technologies":"Safety planning software, risk assessment tools","People":"Construction permittees, project participants","Owner":"City of Boston"}]}
